entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:27 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 9:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 90 %

Wind: ESE 3 km/h

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this morning. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:06 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 9:06 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:06 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
